prompt_base: hyperdetailed portrait of an imposing tall alien man, VIBRANT emerald green skin texture, black cape and white turban, intense focused eyes, muscular physique
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k, cinematic volumetric rim lighting, detailed skin surface imperfections, subtle wet sheen on the skin, professional studio light, HIGH COLOR FIDELITY
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, illustration, CGI, toy, plastic, smooth green skin, cell shaded, dark silhouette, black skin, shadows obscuring color, bad anatomy, unrealistic textures
